Description:
April teaches Python on livestream, but what happens when viewers get stuck on practice exercises offline? To solve this, she built a dedicated learning platform featuring a custom AI tutor. In this video, watch how she uses the GitHub Copilot SDK to create an assistant that gives helpful hints instead of just handing out the answers.

Copilot SDK: https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk?utm\_source=youtube-description-python-demo-ga-copilot-sdk&utm\_medium=social&utm\_campaign=SDK-GA-March-2026

#GitHubCopilot #CopilotSDK #Python

▬▬▬▬▬▬ TIMESTAMPS ⌚ ▬▬▬▬▬▬

00:00 Introduction 00:15 Demo of the platform 01:27 Create the Python tutor with the GitHub Copilot SDK 04:11 Integrate the Python tutor into the platform 08:30 Test the Python tutor integration 10:37 Conclusion

Title: How I built an AI Python tutor with the GitHub Copilot SDK
